title: Message to General Pershing on His 85th Birthday.
text:
Dear General Pershing:

This should be one of the happiest of your many birthdays as you remember that this time we went all the way through to Berlin, as you counseled in 1918. I hail a great soldier who happily exemplified also the vision of the statesman.

With every good wish. Very sincerely yours,

HARRY S. TRUMAN
garbage_collected: [General John J. Pershing, Walter Reed Hospital ]
